featured.text: Because of its small size, it might have missed the other car completely.
Some critics worry that online students will miss out on the social aspects of college.
If I had known the fact, (C) … or she might miss the class.
When he stepped into the booth, he could pick up the phone to call his cousin, telling him how he was, and how he missed him.
How many times have you missed a picture because you failed to reload the film?” 51.

other.text: With a good ______ of both Chinese and English, Miss Lin was assigned the task of oral interpretation for the visiting American delegation.
If we work hard to _____ our dreams when we are young, we will not feel that we missed out on something when we get old.
Dead mail will also be listed on a computer so that people can call in and check to see if a missing item is there.
While the couple were looking _____ for their missing children, the kids were actually having fun in the woods nearby.

definition.en_def: To fail to notice, attend to, or reach something; to feel sad about the absence of someone or something.
definition.example: I miss my friends when they move away.
